fieldGroup.template:
The description regarding the methodological design will depend on the committee to which the annual report is addressed.

  • For the CEI, describing the current sample (characteristics and size) and the development of the project, indicating whether issues have arisen and how they have been resolved.
  • For the CEEA, describing the sample (total number of animals used to date) and the development of the project, indicating whether issues have arisen and how they have been resolved.
  • For the CBE, the development of the project, indicating whether issues have arisen and how they have been resolved.
Briefly describe how the project is developing methodologically and point out the problems encountered and their solutions, if any.
